text.ascii: janamejaya uvAca
text.ur: janamejaya uvāca

text.ascii: evaM matsyasya nagare vasantas tatra pANDavAH
text.ur: evaṁ matsyasya nagare vasantas tatra pāṇḍavāḥ

text.ascii: ata UrdhvaM mahAvIryAH kim akurvanta vai dvija
text.ud: अत ऊर्ध्वं महावीर्याः किमकुर्वन्त वै द्विज
text.ur: ata ūrdhvaṁ mahāvīryāḥ kim akurvanta vai dvija

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: evaM te nyavasaMs tatra pracchannAH kurunandanAH
text.ur: evaṁ te nyavasaṁs tatra pracchannāḥ kurunandanāḥ

text.ascii: ArAdhayanto rAjAnaM yad akurvanta tac chRNu
text.ur: ārādhayanto rājānaṁ yad akurvanta tac chr̥ṇu

text.ascii: yudhiSThiraH sabhAstAraH sabhyAnAm abhavat priyaH
text.ur: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ sabhāstāraḥ sabhyānām abhavat priyaḥ

text.ascii: tathaiva ca virATasya saputrasya vizAM pate
text.ud: तथैव च विराटस्य सपुत्रस्य विशां पते
text.ur: tathaiva ca virāṭasya saputrasya viśāṁ pate

text.ascii: sa hy akSahRdayajJas tAn krIDayAm Asa pANDavaH
text.ur: sa hy akṣahr̥dayajñas tān krīḍayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ

text.ascii: akSavatyAM yathAkAmaM sUtrabaddhAn iva dvijAn
text.ur: akṣavatyāṁ yathākāmaṁ sūtrabaddhān iva dvijān

text.ascii: ajJAtaM ca virATasya vijitya vasu dharmarAT
text.ud: अज्ञातं च विराटस्य विजित्य वसु धर्मराट्
text.ur: ajñātaṁ ca virāṭasya vijitya vasu dharmarāṭ

text.ascii: bhrAtRbhyaH puruSavyAghro yathArhaM sma prayacchati
text.ur: bhrātr̥bhyaḥ puruṣavyāghro yathārhaṁ sma prayacchati

text.ascii: bhImaseno 'pi mAMsAni bhakSyANi vividhAni ca
text.ur: bhīmaseno ’pi māṁsāni bhakṣyāṇi vividhāni ca

text.ascii: atisRSTAni matsyena vikrINAti yudhiSThire
text.ur: atisr̥ṣṭāni matsyena vikrīṇāti yudhiṣṭhire

text.ascii: vAsAMsi parijIrNAni labdhAny antaHpure 'rjunaH
text.ur: vāsāṁsi parijīrṇāni labdhāny antaḥpure ’rjunaḥ

text.ascii: vikrINAnaz ca sarvebhyaH pANDavebhyaH prayacchati
text.ur: vikrīṇānaś ca sarvebhyaḥ pāṇḍavebhyaḥ prayacchati

text.ascii: sahadevo 'pi gopAnAM veSam AsthAya pANDavaH
text.ur: sahadevo ’pi gopānāṁ veṣam āsthāya pāṇḍavaḥ

text.ascii: dadhi kSIraM ghRtaM caiva pANDavebhyaH prayacchati
text.ud: दधि क्षीरं घृतं चैव पाण्डवेभ्यः प्रयच्छति
text.ur: dadhi kṣīraṁ ghr̥taṁ caiva pāṇḍavebhyaḥ prayacchati

text.ascii: nakulo 'pi dhanaM labdhvA kRte karmaNi vAjinAm
text.ud: नकुलोऽपि धनं लब्ध्वा कृते कर्मणि वाजिनाम्
text.ur: nakulo ’pi dhanaṁ labdhvā kr̥te karmaṇi vājinām

text.ascii: tuSTe tasmin narapatau pANDavebhyaH prayacchati
text.ur: tuṣṭe tasmin narapatau pāṇḍavebhyaḥ prayacchati

text.ascii: kRSNApi sarvAn bhrAtqMs tAn nirIkSantI tapasvinI
text.ur: kr̥ṣṇāpi sarvān bhrātr̥̄ṁs tān nirīkṣantī tapasvinī

text.ascii: yathA punar avijJAtA tathA carati bhAminI
text.ur: yathā punar avijñātā tathā carati bhāminī

text.ascii: evaM saMpAdayantas te tathAnyonyaM mahArathAH
text.ur: evaṁ saṁpādayantas te tathānyonyaṁ mahārathāḥ

text.ascii: prekSamANAs tadA kRSNAm USuz channA narAdhipa
text.ur: prekṣamāṇās tadā kr̥ṣṇām ūṣuś channā narādhipa

text.ascii: atha mAse caturthe tu brahmaNaH sumahotsavaH
text.ud: अथ मासे चतुर्थे तु ब्रह्मणः सुमहोत्सवः
text.ur: atha māse caturthe tu brahmaṇaḥ sumahotsavaḥ

text.ascii: AsIt samRddho matsyeSu puruSANAM susaMmataH
text.ur: āsīt samr̥ddho matsyeṣu puruṣāṇāṁ susaṁmataḥ

text.ascii: tatra mallAH samApetur digbhyo rAjan sahasrazaH
text.ur: tatra mallāḥ samāpetur digbhyo rājan sahasraśaḥ

text.ascii: mahAkAyA mahAvIryAH kAlakhaJjA ivAsurAH
text.ur: mahākāyā mahāvīryāḥ kālakhañjā ivāsurāḥ

text.ascii: vIryonnaddhA balodagrA rAjJA samabhipUjitAH
text.ur: vīryonnaddhā balodagrā rājñā samabhipūjitāḥ

text.ascii: siMhaskandhakaTigrIvAH svavadAtA manasvinaH
text.ur: siṁhaskandhakaṭigrīvāḥ svavadātā manasvinaḥ

text.ascii: asakRllabdhalakSAs te raGge pArthivasaMnidhau
text.ur: asakr̥llabdhalakṣās te raṅge pārthivasaṁnidhau

text.ascii: teSAm eko mahAn AsIt sarvamallAn samAhvayat
text.ur: teṣām eko mahān āsīt sarvamallān samāhvayat

text.ascii: AvalgamAnaM taM raGge nopatiSThati kaz cana
text.ur: āvalgamānaṁ taṁ raṅge nopatiṣṭhati kaś cana

text.ascii: yadA sarve vimanasas te mallA hatacetasaH
text.ur: yadā sarve vimanasas te mallā hatacetasaḥ

text.ascii: atha sUdena taM mallaM yodhayAm Asa matsyarAT
text.ud: अथ सूदेन तं मल्लं योधयामास मत्स्यराट्
text.ur: atha sūdena taṁ mallaṁ yodhayām āsa matsyarāṭ

text.ascii: codyamAnas tato bhImo duHkhenaivAkaron matim
text.ur: codyamānas tato bhīmo duḥkhenaivākaron matim

text.ascii: na hi zaknoti vivRte pratyAkhyAtuM narAdhipam
text.ud: न हि शक्नोति विवृते प्रत्याख्यातुं नराधिपम्
text.ur: na hi śaknoti vivr̥te pratyākhyātuṁ narādhipam

text.ascii: tataH sa puruSavyAghraH zArdUlazithilaM caran
text.ur: tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghraḥ śārdūlaśithilaṁ caran

text.ascii: praviveza mahAraGgaM virATam abhiharSayan
text.ur: praviveśa mahāraṅgaṁ virāṭam abhiharṣayan

text.ascii: babandha kakSyAM kaunteyas tatas taM harSayaJ janam
text.ur: babandha kakṣyāṁ kaunteyas tatas taṁ harṣayañ janam

text.ascii: tatas taM vRtrasaMkAzaM bhImo mallaM samAhvayat
text.ur: tatas taṁ vr̥trasaṁkāśaṁ bhīmo mallaṁ samāhvayat

text.ascii: tAv ubhau sumahotsAhAv ubhau tIvraparAkramau
text.ur: tāv ubhau sumahotsāhāv ubhau tīvraparākramau

text.ascii: mattAv iva mahAkAyau vAraNau SaSTihAyanau
text.ur: mattāv iva mahākāyau vāraṇau ṣaṣṭihāyanau

text.ascii: cakarSa dorbhyAm utpATya bhImo mallam amitrahA
text.ur: cakarṣa dorbhyām utpāṭya bhīmo mallam amitrahā

text.ascii: vinadantam abhikrozaJ zArdUla iva vAraNam
text.ur: vinadantam abhikrośañ śārdūla iva vāraṇam

text.ascii: tam udyamya mahAbAhur bhrAmayAm Asa vIryavAn
text.ur: tam udyamya mahābāhur bhrāmayām āsa vīryavān

text.ascii: tato mallAz ca matsyAz ca vismayaM cakrire param
text.ud: ततो मल्लाश्च मत्स्याश्च विस्मयं चक्रिरे परम्
text.ur: tato mallāś ca matsyāś ca vismayaṁ cakrire param

text.ascii: bhrAmayitvA zataguNaM gatasattvam acetanam
text.ur: bhrāmayitvā śataguṇaṁ gatasattvam acetanam

text.ascii: pratyapiMSan mahAbAhur mallaM bhuvi vRkodaraH
text.ur: pratyapiṁṣan mahābāhur mallaṁ bhuvi vr̥kodaraḥ

text.ascii: tasmin vinihate malle jImUte lokavizrute
text.ur: tasmin vinihate malle jīmūte lokaviśrute

text.ascii: virATaH paramaM harSam agacchad bAndhavaiH saha
text.ur: virāṭaḥ paramaṁ harṣam agacchad bāndhavaiḥ saha

text.ascii: saMharSAt pradadau vittaM bahu rAjA mahAmanAH
text.ur: saṁharṣāt pradadau vittaṁ bahu rājā mahāmanāḥ

text.ascii: ballavAya mahAraGge yathA vaizravaNas tathA
text.ur: ballavāya mahāraṅge yathā vaiśravaṇas tathā

text.ascii: evaM sa subahUn mallAn puruSAMz ca mahAbalAn
text.ur: evaṁ sa subahūn mallān puruṣāṁś ca mahābalān

text.ascii: vinighnan matsyarAjasya prItim Avahad uttamAm
text.ur: vinighnan matsyarājasya prītim āvahad uttamām

text.ascii: yadAsya tulyaH puruSo na kaz cit tatra vidyate
text.ud: यदास्य तुल्यः पुरुषो न कश्चित्तत्र विद्यते
text.ur: yadāsya tulyaḥ puruṣo na kaś cit tatra vidyate

text.ascii: tato vyAghraiz ca siMhaiz ca dviradaiz cApy ayodhayat
text.ur: tato vyāghraiś ca siṁhaiś ca dviradaiś cāpy ayodhayat

text.ascii: punar antaHpuragataH strINAM madhye vRkodaraH
text.ur: punar antaḥpuragataḥ strīṇāṁ madhye vr̥kodaraḥ

text.ascii: yodhyate sma virATena siMhair mattair mahAbalaiH
text.ur: yodhyate sma virāṭena siṁhair mattair mahābalaiḥ

text.ascii: bIbhatsur api gItena sunRttena ca pANDavaH
text.ur: bībhatsur api gītena sunr̥ttena ca pāṇḍavaḥ

text.ascii: virATaM toSayAm Asa sarvAz cAntaHpurastriyaH
text.ur: virāṭaṁ toṣayām āsa sarvāś cāntaḥpurastriyaḥ

text.ascii: azvair vinItair javanais tatra tatra samAgataiH
text.ur: aśvair vinītair javanais tatra tatra samāgataiḥ

text.ascii: toSayAm Asa nakulo rAjAnaM rAjasattama
text.ur: toṣayām āsa nakulo rājānaṁ rājasattama

text.ascii: tasmai pradeyaM prAyacchat prIto rAjA dhanaM bahu
text.ud: तस्मै प्रदेयं प्रायच्छत्प्रीतो राजा धनं बहु
text.ur: tasmai pradeyaṁ prāyacchat prīto rājā dhanaṁ bahu

text.ascii: vinItAn vRSabhAn dRSTvA sahadevasya cAbhibho
text.ur: vinītān vr̥ṣabhān dr̥ṣṭvā sahadevasya cābhibho

text.ascii: evaM te nyavasaMs tatra pracchannAH puruSarSabhAH
text.ur: evaṁ te nyavasaṁs tatra pracchannāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ

text.ascii: karmANi tasya kurvANA virATanRpates tadA
text.ur: karmāṇi tasya kurvāṇā virāṭanr̥pates tadā
